seniority_level.evidence: Title mentions 'Associate Software Developer' and requires 6-7 years of total experience with 4-5 years of relevant experience. Responsibilities align more with mid-level than senior.

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer-Data Platforms-Azure' and core responsibilities focus on data pipelines, ETL, and data management systems.

sub_specialty.evidence: Both batch and real-time processing mentioned explicitly in the job description.

leadership_expectation.evidence: Role emphasizes individual contributions like data gathering, storage, and processing. No direct leadership or management responsibilities mentioned.

primary_cloud.evidence: Azure Databricks, Azure DevOps, and Azure Blob explicitly mentioned as mandatory skills.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers mentioned beyond Azure.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Job description mentions both batch ('scheduled jobs', 'ETL') and real-time ('real-time processing') paradigms.

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure DevOps mentioned as a mandatory skill, which is a cloud-native orchestration tool for Azure.

storage_layer.evidence: Azure Blob (data lake pattern) and SQL (data warehouse pattern) mentioned as mandatory skills.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as Kochi, Kerala, India, but no remote work model or restrictions are discussed.

timezone_focus.evidence: Location is explicitly stated as Kochi, Kerala, India, suggesting focus on candidates within India.

relocation_required.evidence: No mention of relocation support or requirements, only location is specified.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is not mentioned in the job posting.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No signals about OPT/CPT or student visa support, and location is specified as India.

citizenship_required.evidence: No discussion about work authorization, citizenship, or green card requirements.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type and contract details are not mentioned.

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits are discussed in the job posting.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions contributing to 'innovation and adoption of new technology' and 'teamwork', but no specific career paths or ladders.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Job posting mentions collaborating with 'diverse teams' and 'partnering with other scientists, engineers, consultants and database administrators', suggesting mentorship opportunities.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion or advancement paths.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No discussion about internal mobility or role changes.

career_tracks_available.evidence: Role emphasizes technical contributions and mentions 'Associate Software Developer', suggesting IC track is available but no other tracks are mentioned.

requirement_strictness.evidence: All skills listed are mandatory with no 'nice-to-have' or preferred skills distinction, indicating high strictness.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description is focused on data engineering tasks with well-defined responsibilities like ETL, data pipelines, and collaboration with specific roles.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Title is 'Associate Software Developer' but requires 6-7 years of experience, which is typically aligned with mid or senior roles. Core responsibilities also include advanced tasks like predictive modeling and enterprise search applications.
